thread.title: Wannakee Hedwood
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Wannakee Hedwood

author: Wannakee Hedwood
title: Wannakee Hedwood
text: From my salesman Paul @ the 8 mile location. To the delivery men today. I feel like my experience was very good. I felt very important from the moment I stepped into Garden White . I hope I enjoy my mattress set as much as I enjoyed the customer service I received from your company.
